definition: article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)
topic/problem for discussion/exam question/subject/to inscribe/to mention/CL:個|个[ge4],道[dao4]

sentences.english: Talk about your health. Make suggestions.
sentences.chinese: 品题辩论康健话题和提出提议。

sentences.english: There'll be some sport reviews on TV.
sentences.chinese: 电视机上会有一些体育运动品题。

sentences.english: Therefore, underachievement can be viewed as a social product, not just the problem of the child.
sentences.chinese: ∴潜能未展可视为社会的产品，而不只是学生的品题。

sentences.english: They sat around the table talking the news.
sentences.chinese: 她们绕桌而坐品题辩论新闻。

sentences.english: One businessmen were talking about advertising on TV excitedly.
sentences.chinese: 一些商贾正在兴奋地品题辩论电视机广告。

definition: extemporaneous thoughts noted down after a visit
to pore over a book/to look and admire
to copy/to pass on a copy
to inscribe a poem (often, composed on the spot) on a painting, fan or ceramic bowl etc as a work of calligraphy/an inscribed poem
interpreting words/to explain the meaning of words in classic texts/to decipher an old script
